definitions.definition: To determine, estimate or judge the value of; to evaluate
To impose or charge, especially as punishment for an infraction.
definitions.example: A $10.00 late fee will be assessed on all overdue accounts.

definitions.definition: To calculate and demand (the tax money due) from a person or entity.
definitions.example: Once you've submitted a tax return, the Tax Department will assess the amount of tax you still owe.
